ygData.subject: Blackbox Refiner
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently traveled back to akanon to try and get some of the new quest items (glow rod and bootstrutter s pack) and talked to the scrapyard guy about
ygData.messageBody:
I recently traveled back to akanon to try and get some of the new quest
items (glow rod and bootstrutter's pack) and talked to the scrapyard guy
about blackboxes (I think I said "what blackbox") and he talked about how
the blackboxes contain information which can be gotten only by useing a
Blackbox Refiner. This is something I've never heard of before and he
didn't respond differently to the words Blackbox Refiner or Refiner. He
also talked about the Eldritch Collective useing them and I talked to
everyone in ak'anon and the gnomes in the windmills and no one responded
differently to it.

Does anyone know anything about this? I think it was the scrapyard guy
that mentioned it, either him or Manic in the gemchopper's hall.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
Ubershadow Leprechaun - Level 28 Gnome Rogue
Uberkniggit - Level 12 Troll Shadowknight
